SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
This class serves as the entry point for the Hangman game application.
ExitButtonAction
Class that implements ActionListener for handling button press events.
ExitButtonActionEvent
Class extending EventObject representing the event passed to the listener when the exit button is pressed.
ExitButtonActionListener
Interface extending EventListener.
Game
This class represents the game logic and user interface for the Hangman game.
GameMenuBar
This class represents the menu bar with options for new game, exit, and statistics.
GuessButtonAction
This class handles the event of pressing the guess button.
GuessButtonActionEvent
This class represents an event for the guess button action.
GuessButtonActionListener
This interface should be implemented by any class that wants to handle the guess button action events.
HighscoreManager
This class manages the high scores and player statistics.
HighscorePage
This class represents the high score page of the game.
IndexPage
This class represents the index page of the Hangman game.
NewGameButtonAction
This class handles the event of pressing the new game button.
NewGameButtonActionEvent
This class represents an event for the new game button action.
NewGameButtonActionListener
This interface should be implemented by any class that wants to handle the new game button action events.
PlayButtonAction
This class handles the event of pressing the play button.
PlayButtonActionEvent
This class represents an event for the play button action.
PlayButtonActionListener
This interface should be implemented by any class that wants to handle the play button action events.
PlayerStats
This class represents the statistics of a player.
PlayerStatsInterface
This interface defines the operations for accessing and modifying player statistics.
